 This won't count as a battle cruiser sense it can't even move 
outside its orbit let alone attack. It can defend and spy though. It 
will be a few more posts before Mustex learns it's there let alone 
how to activate it(that could be months). So council what do think
(and please it would look stupid if you all send post that read in 
full NO! without any explanation or anything).

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> Oh the moon that is presently orbiting our planet called earth is 
really a 
> giant dormant robot? Oh well that changes everything I mean I 
myself have the 
> controller for it. Its a special button with the windows sign. And 
yes there 
> is arule against declaring the moon as a giant robot you want to 
use against 
> the base. Its called stating it without asking the council about it 
since 
> there is a rule about bringing in Battlecruisers(Which are a 
helluva lot 
> smaller then the moon) and asking the council about bringing it in.
